# Tender Announcement: 350 MHz Oscilloscope

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4367731482
* **Reference Number**: WS4367731482-DOCP4367746962
* **Publication Date**: December 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

## Tender Status

* **Tender Status (English)**: Cancelled
* **Tender Status (French)**: Annulé

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Various trade agreements, including Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and others.

## Contracting Entity and End User

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Sabrina Cheng (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Description

AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 15, 2024, by 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

This Request for Proposal is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60HN-16ELEC only, for the purchase of electrical and electronic products. The requirement is for an 350 MHz oscilloscope for Environment and Climate Change Canada. This requirement is open only to pre-qualified Supply Arrangement Holders under the product categories and manufacturers identified in the Annexes A1 and A2.

## Notes

This tender is for a specific requirement and is not a public tender. Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC have been invited to bid.
